{{Description|Offer the [[Pyro Sigil]]s you obtain on your adventures to the [[Tablet of Tona]] to receive the Sacred Flame's protection and blessings|System Unlock: Blessing of Tona's Flame}}
'''Tona's Flame's Restitution''' is an [[Offering System]] that is leveled with [[Pyro Sigil]]s. It can be found at the [[Tablet of Tona]] in [[Temple of Pax]], [[Natlan]].

<!--Tona's Flame's Restitution is unlocked by ?.
-->
As of [[Version 5.5]], the maximum level is '''40'''. Attempting to offer any further ''Pyro Sigils'' will display the following error: ''"Max level reached for the current version."''<!--
Prior to [[Version ?]], the maximum level was limited to 20, 30 and 40 in Versions 5.0-5.1, 5.2-5.4 and 5.5-? respectively despite the possibility of obtaining more than enough Pyro Sigils. The game prevented players from offering more by displaying the following error: ''"Max level reached for the current version."''
-->

==Rewards==
Raising Tona's Flame's Restitution level requires {{Item|Pyro Sigil}} offered in groups of 30.<!--A total of 1500 Pyro Sigils are required to reach the maximum level.--> Once made available reaching the maximum level will grant the {{Achievement|The Firey Hue of the Scorching Sun}}.

All levels<!--, except level 50,--> will reward: {{Card List|Primogem*50;Adventure EXP*200;Sanctifying Unction*5|show_caption=1|delim=;}}

==Trivia==
===Etymology===
* The word ''{{wt|tona#Classical Nahuatl|tona}}'' is a verb in Classical Nahuatl, meaning "to shine" or "to be warm."
